# Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
```

```{r}

coords
```

# Wrangling  
```{r}
coords_w <- coords |>
  # Standardizing names
  clean_names() |>
  # Select target columns  
  dplyr::select(year, reg_code,
                loccode, varcode,
                latitude, longitude 
                )
  # Remove degree N and W from latitude and longitude
  
  # Transform into numeric
  #mutate(latitude = as.numeric(latitude))

  # Transform into geospatial object

coords_w
```
